## Data from Open Street Map

```{r,message=F}
library(osmar)
api <- osmsource_api()
library(ggmap)
```

## Download OSM data 

```{r}
cityC <- geocode("Berlin")
bb <- center_bbox(cityC$lon,cityC$lat,1000, 1000)
uaBerlin <- get_osm(bb, source = api)
```


## The worldHires data

```{r}
library(mapdata)
data(worldHiresMapEnv)
map('worldHires', col=1:10)
```

library(HistData)
